featured.text: If you are using fast film, you can take some good, quick shots of a pet by simply snapping a picture right after calling its name.

definition.zh_def: 迅速地折斷或發出聲音的動作。
definition.en_def: To break suddenly and sharply or to make a sudden, sharp sound.
definition.example: She heard a snap as the twig broke under her foot.
